verses.verse: When <S%H3478>Israel<s%> went forth <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> from a <S%H5971>people<s%> of foreign <S%H3937>language;<s%>
What was <S%H3220>it,<s%> you sea, that you <S%H5127>fled?<s%> You <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> that you <S%H5437>turned<s%> <S%H268>back?<s%>
You <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> that you <S%H7540>skipped<s%> like <S%H352>rams;<s%> you little <S%H1389>hills,<s%> like <S%H1121>lambs?<s%>
<S%H2342>Tremble,<s%> you <S%H776>earth,<s%> at the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H113>Lord,<s%> at the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H433>God<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%>
who <S%H2015>turned<s%> the <S%H6697>rock<s%> into a <S%H98>pool<s%> of <S%H4325>water,<s%> the <S%H2496>flint<s%> into a <S%H4599>spring<s%> of <S%H4325>waters.<s%>
